attributes.contentHtml: I used to work at SalioNodes until I realized that the owner "Roxyy/Zonie" was using me as a money maker. He was trying to keep me as one to. When my friend joined the server and said something all Zonie did was start a fight. After that fight Zonie banned my friend (Henry and Codiac) and went to my dms. All I asked Zonie was that why he didn't want to be friends. All Zonie said is that "I DONT WANT TO BE" in full caps. The scam part is that Zonie was looking into everyones files. How do I know without proof? I know without proof because Zonie was taking the ping command from someone. Here is the DM's of why he wanted to quit SalioNodes "because I was not there anymore".

RaccoLMAO Everyone who i was rude to i just want to say im sorry for everything i was going through a really hard time and i promise to never be like that.
Can you all forgive?
